title: Moonshine
description: Claire is tired of pretending to be polite, docile...human. She wants to unleash the animal inside her, and she wants to do it with a man who can really handle her. Then she meets Lars, a dangerous, sexy alpha, in a smoky bar. They share some moonshine, a potent shifter aphrodisiac, and have blisteringly hot sex.Their one night of intoxicated passion leaves her wanting more, but Lars isn't interested in a woman who can only let loose while under the influence. Claire must then decide whether she's ready--and willing--to truly embrace her wild side.*** Paranormal Erotica 9,500 words, 25 pagesOriginally published in 2008 by Cobblestone Press. All reissued Moira Rogers titles are also available for free download at the author's website. See for more details.***
author: Moira Rogers
